snippet.title: Sorcery! 3: The Seven Serpents Official Trailer
snippet.description:
An epic fantasy adventure! Available on iOS and Android, coming to PC & Mac April 5th, 2016.

Find out more: http://www.inklestudios.com/sorcery

Sorcery! 3 continues the epic narrative adventure into the wilds of Kakhabad - a cursed land, stalked by serpents, and unstuck in time. Explore an open world, travel through time, cast powerful spells, battle deadly creatures, gamble with swindlers - with every choice you make remembered and shaping the story. 

Begin your adventure here, or load your character from previous games to continue the story.

Praise for Sorcery!:
“You should choose to own this adventure" -- Eurogamer
"Inkle's adaptation of Sorcery! takes the genre to a whole new level" -- Kotaku
"This is some of 2013′s best interactive storytelling" -- IGN UK
"Beautifully realised ... this gripping tale has us well and truly hooked" -- Pocket Gamer (Gold Award)
"Incredibly impressed" -- Touch Arcade
"100%" -- Gamezebo
“Interactive Fiction Game of the Year” -- Pocket Tactics

+ A 3D hand-drawn map to explore freely
+ Alter the world with time beacons, and travel into the past
+ Uncover the secrets of Kakhabad, its curse, its lost Gods
+ Thirty new creatures to fight, including your toughest opponents yet; the Seven Serpents 
+ New spells to discover
+ Bluff and gamble against new Swindlestones opponents
+ Created using our unique inklewriter engine; the same technology behind 4-times BAFTA nominated “80 DAYS”.
+ Choices from previous games change the adventure; and how you play will alter Part 4.

Can you survive The Seven Serpents?

A fully interactive story with 10,000 choices and over 450,000 words of content, all your decisions shape the adventure you undertake. Our inklewriter technology writes the story in real-time, including procedurally combat sequences and banter with locals. No two games will be the same!

For the first time in the Sorcery! series, the world is now open and can be explored in any order you like. Hunt down every last secret or find the fastest ways across the wilds; the choice is yours.


Music by Laurence Chapman (http://laurencechapman.com)

Map by Mike Schley (http://mikeschley.com)

Original Illustrations by John Blanche


Like us on Facebook!

http://www.facebook.com/inkleStudios


Follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/inklestudios


Steve Jackson's Sorcery! is an epic solo quest first published by Penguin Books (UK) within the 'Fighting Fantasy' series of adventure gamebooks. Sorcery! was originally published 1983-1999 by Penguin Books (UK). Published 2003-present by Wizard Books, a division of Icon Books (UK).


Fighting Fantasy, created by Steve Jackson & Ian Livingstone, has been the world's most successful series of interactive fantasy adventure gamebooks, published in 27 countries and 22 languages. Over 25 million copies have been sold worldwide.

http://www.fightingfantasy.com


Steve Jackson is a legendary UK games designer, co-founder with Ian Livingstone of Games Workshop and Fighting Fantasy. Jackson also co-founded Lionhead Studios with Peter Molyneux. 


inkle is a Cambridge-based software and design company specialising in interactive stories, founded by former Sony Playstation designers Joseph Humfrey and Jon Ingold. Their last game, 80 DAYS, was TIME magazine’s Game of the Year across all platforms, and received four BAFTA nominations, and an IGF award. Their inklewriter website for creating interactive stories is used by schools, game designers and writers.

http://www.inklestudios.com


Text and illustrations copyright © 1983-present Steve Jackson, all rights reserved.
Sorcery! concept and logos are © 1983-present Steve Jackson, all rights reserved.
Digital conversion and code © 2013 inkle Ltd, all rights reserved
